page.title: 14 THE PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: { THE STAVELEY ARMS} was built in about 1600.It is owned by Mr.Simon Staveley. It is a free house.They are able to sell anybodies beer.The customers do like the pub very much.They sell about 1000 pints of beer.The people who work in the pub have lived there for 14 months. They raise money for Athritis Research.The Staveley arms has always been a pub. They collect things like militaria. There is a Herbies play area for kids.It is known as the family inn. { THE CROSS KEYS}was built over 100 years ago.The brewery that own it is called Bass.The people that run it have lived there for 3 years. At one time it used to be a pub and a shop.They have about 50 people come every night.They frequently collect money for charity.
